question: Which Union Ministry has launched Artificial Intelligence (AI)- based ‘ASEEM’ portal?
option1: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
option4: Ministry of Health and Family welfare
answer: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
explanation:
Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship has launched ‘Aatamanirbhar Skilled Employee Employer Mapping (ASEEM)’ portal.
The Artificial Intelligence (AI)- based portal will provide a digital platform to the employers to evaluate the availability of skilled workforce, in their hiring process. The portal also helps the workforce to attain industry-relevant skills and search for job opportunities.
